$:/plugins/kookma/toc/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/history
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/history.text:
Full change log  https://kookma.github.io/TW-TOC/#ChangeLog

* ''1.5.0''  -- 2025.07.23 -- update to Tiddlywiki 5.3.8
* ''1.5.0''  -- 2023.02.16 -- update to Tiddlywiki 5.2.5
* ''1.4.1''  -- 2022.04.09 -- outlining was added
* ''1.3.1''  -- 2021.09.27 -- stable release
* ''0.1.0 '' -- 2020.01.23 -- initial release

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/helper.text:
\define tidSelectedItem() $:/temp/toc/selected-item/$(stateTiddler)$
\define tidToggleState()  $:/temp/toc/toggle/$(stateTiddler)$

\define tidShowMode()  $:/temp/toc/show-mode/$(stateTiddler)$
\define tidExpandAll() $:/temp/toc/expand-all//$(stateTiddler)$
\define tidShowTools() $:/temp/toc/show-tools/$(stateTiddler)$

\define tidTocTemplate()    $:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/show-single-item
\define tidBookmarkConfig() $:/config/toc/bookmarks/$(stateTiddler)$

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-draggable
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.text:
\define toc-item-dragdata() $:/temp/toc/dragdata \define toc-item-dragdata-path() $:/temp/toc/dragdata/path \define toc-item-dragstart() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> \end \define toc-item-dragend() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define toc_caption() <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title" format="plainwikified"/> \end \define toc-item-dragtip() <$wikify name=actionTiddler text={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$vars actionTiddlerx={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$list filter="[!match]">
drop <$tiddler tiddler=<>>''<>''
onto <$tiddler tiddler=<> >''<>''
NO KEY=insert before, SHIFT=insert after, CTRL=drop into
\end \define toc-item-drop() <$reveal default=<> type="nomatch" text=<>> <$vars sourcepath={{{ [get[text]] }}} targetpath=<> > <$vars oldtag= {{{ [split[/]]-[]+[last[]] }}} newtag={{{ [split[/]]-[]+[last[]] }}}> <$reveal default=<> type="match" text="normal"> <$set name="order" filter="[tagging[]]"> <$list filter=<>> <$action-deletefield $field="list-before"/> <$action-deletefield $field="list-after"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $subfilter="-[] []" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[]" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="[enlist] -[] [] +[putbefore]" /> <$reveal default=<> type="match" text="shift"> <$set name="order" filter="[tagging[]]"> <$list filter=<>> <$action-deletefield $field="list-before"/> <$action-deletefield $field="list-after"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $subfilter="-[] []" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[]" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="[enlist] -[] [] +[putafter]" /> <$reveal default=<> type="match" text="ctrl"> <$set name="order" filter="[tagging[]]"> <$list filter=<>> <$action-deletefield $field="list-before"/> <$action-deletefield $field="list-after"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $subfilter="-[] []" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[]" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="[enlist] -[] []" /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-exapndable
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.text:
\define toc-open-icon() $:/core/images/down-arrow \define toc-closed-icon() $:/core/images/right-arrow \define toc-show-item-authormode(item, is-branch:no) <$vars item=<<__item__>> is-branch=<<__is-branch__>> > <$droppable actions=<>>
<$draggable tiddler=<> startactions=<> endactions=<> dragimagetype="blank"> {{$item$||$(tidTocTemplate)$}}
<>
\end \define toc-show-item-readermode(item, is-branch:no) <$vars item=<<__item__>> is-branch=<<__is-branch__>> > {{$item$||$(tidTocTemplate)$}} \end \define toggle-branch() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setIndex=<> setTo="yes"> <$transclude tiddler=<> /> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setIndex=<> > <$transclude tiddler=<> /> \end \define _toc-tree-body(here, exclude, path) <$vars path="""$path$/$here$"""> <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$ +[limit[1]]""" emptyMessage="""
  • <$macrocall $name=<> item=<<__here__>> />
    • """ variable=ignore>
  • <$macrocall $name=<> item=<<__here__>> is-branch="yes"/>
    • <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex=<> text="yes">
      <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$"""> <$macrocall $name="_toc-tree-body" here=<> exclude="""$exclude$ -[[$here$]]""" path=<>/>
    \end \define toc-tree(here, exclude, mode) <$set name=toc-show-mode value=<<__mode__>> emptyValue="toc-show-item-readermode">
      <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$ -[[$here$]]"""> <$macrocall $name="_toc-tree-body" here=<> exclude="""$exclude$ -[[$here$]]""" path="""$here$""" />
    \end \define item-path() $(path)$/$(item)$ \define _toc-expand(here, exclude, path) <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$ -[[$here$]]"""> <$vars item=<> path="""$path$""" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="""$path$""" $value="yes"/> <$macrocall $name="_toc-expand" here=<> exclude="""$exclude$ -[[$here$]]""" path=<>/> \end \define collapse-expand-all(here, exclude) <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text="expand-all"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" tooltip="collapse all">{{$:/core/images/fold-button}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="collapse-all"/> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text="expand-all"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" tooltip="expand all">{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}} <$macrocall $name="_toc-expand" here=<<__here__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> path=<<__here__>> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="expand-all"/> \end \define multilevel-toc-expandable(tag:"TableOfContents", exclude:"", stateTiddler:"multilevelState") <$set name=stateTiddler value=<<__stateTiddler__>> > <$macrocall $name=collapse-expand-all here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> /> <$macrocall $name=toc-tree here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> mode="toc-show-item-readermode" /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-navigation
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.text:
\define toc-list(here,exclude) <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] [subfilter<__exclude__>] -[<__here__>]"""> <$text text="[["/><><$text text="]]"/> <$macrocall $name="toc-list" here=<> exclude="""$exclude$ -[[$here$]]"""/> \end \define toc-hierarchical-navigation(tag:"", exclude:"", class, close:"no") \define prev-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$list filter="[<__close__>match[yes]]" variable=ignore><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end prev-actions \define next-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$list filter="[<__close__>match[yes]]" variable=ignore><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end next-actions <$wikify name="all" text="""<$macrocall $name="toc-list" here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> />"""> <$vars prev={{{ [enlistbefore] }}} > <$vars next={{{ [enlistafter] }}} >
<$list filter="[!is[missing]]" variable="prevTiddler"> <$button to=<> tooltip=<> class="tc-btn-invisible $class$" actions=<> >previous <$list filter="[!is[missing]] [!is[missing]] +[count[]] -1 -0" variable=ignore>| <$list filter="[!is[missing]]" variable="nextTiddler"> <$button to=<> tooltip=<> class="tc-btn-invisible $class$" actions=<> >next
\end toc-hierarchical-navigation \define multilevel-toc-navigation(tag:"TableOfContents", exclude:"", close:"no", class:"", stateTiddler:"multilevelState") <$set name=stateTiddler value=<<__stateTiddler__>> > <$list filter="[!is[system]]">
<$macrocall $name="toc-hierarchical-navigation" tag=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> close=<<__close__>> class=<<__class__>> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-toc-all
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.text:
\define toc-all-body(here,exclude) <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$ -[[$here$]]""">
  • <$link/>
    • <$list filter="[tag]+[limit[1]]" variable=ignore>
      <$macrocall $name="toc-all-body" here=<> exclude="""$exclude$ -[[$here$]]"""/>
    \end \define toc-all(tag, exclude)
      <$macrocall $name="toc-all-body" here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> />
    \end

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-ui
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/multilevel-.text: \define show-mode() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text="toc-show-item-authormode"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" tooltip="switch to author mode">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="toc-show-item-authormode"/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text="toc-show-item-authormode"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" tooltip="switch to reader mode">{{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="toc-show-item-readermode"/> \end \define remove-all-bookmarks() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" tooltip="remove all bookmarks">☆ <$list filter="[!is[missing]]" variable=ignore> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define toggle-display-btnTools() <$list filter="[get[text]match[show]]" emptyMessage="""<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="show"/>"""> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="hide"/> \end \define toc-manager-ui() ---   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" tooltip="toggle tools buttons" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$reveal stateTitle=<> stateField=text text="show" type="match"> <$macrocall $name="collapse-expand-all" here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> /> <$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text="reader" default="author"> <> <> \end \define toc-ui(tag:"TableOfContents", exclude:"", stateTiddler:"multilevelState") <$set name=stateTiddler value=<<__stateTiddler__>> > <> <$macrocall $name=toc-tree here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> mode={{{[get[text]]}}} /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/twolevel-ex.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/twolevel-expandable
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/twolevel-ex.text:
\define toc-open-icon() $:/core/images/down-arrow \define toc-closed-icon() $:/core/images/right-arrow \define twolevel-toc-show-single-item(item) <$set name="openItemClass" filter="[get[text]match<__item__>]" value="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-opened-item" emptyValue="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> <$button class=<> style="outline:none;" to=<<__item__>> dragTiddler=<<__item__>>> <$view tiddler=<<__item__>> field="caption"> <$view tiddler=<<__item__>> field="title"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<<__item__>> /> \end \define twolevel-toc-body(here, exclude) <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$ +[limit[1]]""" emptyMessage="""
  • <$macrocall $name=twolevel-toc-show-single-item item=<<__here__>> />
    • """ variable=ignore>
  • <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex=<<__here__>> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="outline:none;" setTitle=<> setIndex=<<__here__>> setTo="yes"> <$transclude tiddler=<> /> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex=<<__here__>> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="outline:none;" setTitle=<> setIndex=<<__here__>> setTo="no"> <$transclude tiddler=<> /> <$macrocall $name=twolevel-toc-show-single-item item=<<__here__>> />
    • <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex=<<__here__>> text="yes">
      <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$""">
    1. <$macrocall $name=twolevel-toc-show-single-item item=<> />
    \end \define twolevel-toc-tree(here, exclude)
      <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$"""> <$macrocall $name=twolevel-toc-body here=<> exclude=<<__exclude__>> />
    \end \define twolevel-toc-expand-all(here, exclude) <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$"""> <$list filter="[tagcount[]!match[0]]" variable=ignore> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="yes"/> \end \define twolevel-collapse-expand-all(here, exclude) <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text="expand-all"> <$button tooltip="collapse all" class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" style="outline:none;" tooltip="collapse all">{{$:/core/images/fold-button}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="collapse-all"/> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text="expand-all"> <$button tooltip="expand all" class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" style="outline:none;">{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}} <$macrocall $name="twolevel-toc-expand-all" here=<<__here__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="expand-all"/> \end \define twolevel-toc-expandable(tag:"Contents", exclude:"", stateTiddler:"twolevelState") <$set name=stateTiddler value=<<__stateTiddler__>> > <$macrocall $name=twolevel-collapse-expand-all here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> /> <$macrocall $name=twolevel-toc-tree here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/twolevel-na.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/twolevel-navigation
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/macros/twolevel-na.text:
\define twolevel-toc-list(here, exclude) <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]][<__exclude__>]"""> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}}/> <$list filter="""[tag] [<__exclude__>]"""> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}}/> \end \define twolevel-toc-hierarchical-navigation(tag:"", class, exclude:"", close:"no") \define prev-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$list filter="[<__close__>match[yes]]" variable=ignore><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end prev-actions \define next-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> <$list filter="[<__close__>match[yes]]" variable=ignore><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end next-actions <$wikify name="all" text="""<$macrocall $name="twolevel-toc-list" here=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>>/>"""> <$vars prev={{{ [enlistbefore] }}} > <$vars next={{{ [enlistafter] }}} >
<$list filter="[!is[missing]]" variable="prevTiddler"> <$button to=<> tooltip=<> class="tc-btn-invisible $class$" actions=<> >previous <$list filter="[!is[missing]] [!is[missing]] +[count[]] -1 -0" variable=ignore>| <$list filter="[!is[missing]]" variable="nextTiddler"> <$button to=<> tooltip=<> class="tc-btn-invisible $class$" actions=<> >next
\end twolevel-toc-hierarchical-navigation \define twolevel-toc-navigation(tag:"Contents", exclude=<<__exclude__>>, close:"no", class:"", stateTiddler:"twolevelState") <$set name=stateTiddler value=<<__stateTiddler__>> > <$list filter="[!is[system]]">
<$macrocall $name=twolevel-toc-hierarchical-navigation tag=<<__tag__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> close=<<__close__>> class=<<__class__>> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/readme.text:
; TOC
TOC plugin contains several macros, stylesheets and templates to create table of contents and navigator buttons. In contrast to Tiddlywiki core macros, the TOC plugin has many extra features including

* non recursive two level toc
* hierarchical navigation
* exclude feature to exclude a branch or specific entries
* track and highlight the TOC entry opened from table of contents or by navigation buttons

Like core toc macro, TOC plugin supports also the recursive multi level table of contents, but here, it also support hierarchical navigation.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-TOC/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-TOC

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/bookmark.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/bookmark
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/bookmark.text: \define bkm-is-bookmark() $(tidBookmarkConfig)$##$(currentTiddler)$ \define bkm-emptystar() ☆ \define bkm-filledstar() ★ \define bkm-tip-addbkm() add '$(tiptext)$' to Bookmarks \define bkm-tip-rembkm() remove '$(tiptext)$' from Bookmarks <$set name="tiptext" filter="[has[caption]]" value={{!!caption}} emptyValue={{!!title}}> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=<>/> <> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-toc-btn" tooltip=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<>/> <>

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/more-act.title: $:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/more-actions
$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/more-act.text:
\whitespace trim \define config-title() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$button popup=<> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Caption}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=" "/> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Caption}}/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes">
<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" value="tc-btn-invisible"> <$list filter="$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-here $:/core/ui/Buttons/new-journal-here $:/core/ui/Buttons/clone $:/core/ui/Buttons/open-window" variable="listItem"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="inline"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/show-sin.text:
\define toc-show-menu() {{||$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/more-actions}} {{||$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/bookmark}} \end \define show-single-item() <$set name="openItemClass" filter="[get[text]match]" value="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink kk-toc-opened-item" emptyValue="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]" variable=ignore><> <$button class=<> style="outline:none;" to=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<>><> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> /> \end <$reveal default=<> type="match" text="toc-show-item-authormode" >
<> <>
<$reveal default=<> type="nomatch" text="toc-show-item-authormode" >
<> {{||$:/plugins/kookma/toc/templates/bookmark}}
